features: Confetti Stationery Paper: Add a decorative and personal touch to your party invitations, greeting cards, or classroom awards with this polka dot stationery set that includes 96 letter paper sheets
Easy Customization: Our decorative paper features colorful polka dots on the edges and has a sizable space for kids to add text, pictures, drawings, and heartfelt messages
Printer Friendly: Each sheet of confetti computer paper measures 8.5 x 11 inches and is compatible with both inkjet and laser printers: simply create your design and print
Reliable Quality: These letter-size sheets are each made from thick 100gsm paper, have single-side printing on the front, and is blank on the backside

Package Contents: In this pack, you will receive 96 sheets of confetti decorative stationary paper, perfect for using pens, marker, stamps, or paint to create a unique and personalized message at school or home
body.description: This set of 96 sheets of polka dot birthday stationary paper is ideal for creating custom party invitations and thank you notes or save the dates for a baby shower, birthday, wedding, or holiday. The decorative confetti printer paper features colorful round polka dots that add a festive touch to your handwritten letter or greeting card. Each sheet of new years stationery paper measures 8.5 x 11 inches and has ample space to add stickers, stamps, or photo prints. Whether you are an artist at home or a teacher looking to hand out awards in the classroom, you can create a unique design on your computer or laptop; the printer-friendly computer stationery paper is compatible with most printer types; simply design and print!

reviews.reviewText: Using this to make flyers and the bright color and paper quality are perfect, they go through the printer easily and don't get stuck. Love this product.

reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Color quality good
reviews.reviewText: Loved the colors but the paper was a bit on the thin or slippery side and my printer had a hard time catching it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Confetti Stationery Lifts the Spirit!
reviews.reviewText: I am the program director of an art program that provides workshops to children living in shelters and foster care homes. We are currently unable to meet with the children due to the pandemic, so we have started a delivery program of art kits to do at home. I used the Confetti Stationery for the instruction sheet on our latest project and the result was colorful and festive. The bright colors hopefully helped to lift the spirits of our young artisits!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the design
reviews.reviewText: And the quality is great. If you need whimsical paper for a fundraiser, this is it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very pretty and a good value
reviews.reviewText: Love this paper! I used it just this morning and was reminded of what a good purchase it was. The pattern on the paper is just delightful and the colors pop with their brightness. And it is a nice thicker paper also. Not expected for this price. Very good value and very pretty. Would buy from this company again.
